question: Name the only Indian who has featured in the top 30 global CEOs list released by Barron's?
explanation: Aditya Puri, managing director of HDFC has appeared in the top 30 global CEOs list released by Barron's. Aditya Puri has featured in the top 30 global CEOs list by Barron's for the fourth consecutive year. He is the only Indian to feature in the list. Aditya Puri has appeared in the "Growth Leaders" category. He is 67 years old. He has been the Managing Director of HDFC Bank since 1994.
